moves.1. e4: Standard Muzio opening was part of the tournament
moves.1... e5 2. f4 exf4 3. Nf3 g5 4. Bc4 g4 5: I had a poor tournament as black, so tried a variation by not taking the knight!
moves.6. Nd4 Bh6 7. d3 Qf6 8. Nb5 Kd8 9. Be3 N: Standard chessbook stuff... trying to get all my pieces out, and clear the way for Castling
moves.10. d4 Bd7 11. d5 Ne5 12. Bd4 a6 13. Nb5: Here I saw the opening, but need more firepower
moves.15. b4 Bg7: It's all set to go, and I just hope he doesn't see it.
moves.16. b5: and the fly fell into the spider's web
moves.16... Nf3+: this was probably my biggest moment of inspiration ever on a chess board.
moves.17. gxf3 Qxd4+: from here, it's all doom for white.
moves.18. Qxd4 Bxd4+ 19. Kh1 axb5: and white resigned!  play on from here would result in loss of another major piece.
